bibl.title: An Unknown Christian Complex in Alexandria.
bibl.note: Rescue excavations (1981) in the area of Miami-Sidi Bishr in the eastern part of Alexandria. Ancient structures, end of the 4th-early 7th c. A.D.

bibl.title: Coptic Studies. Acts of the Third International Congress of Coptic Studies. Warsaw, 20-25 August, 1984

bibl.seg: DASZEWSKI Wiktor A., Hassan EL SHEIKH, Stanislaw MEDEKSZA, An Unknown Christian Complex in Alexandria.
